name: G3FC Archive
summary: A G3FC file is an archive that stores one or more files in the Generation 3 File Container (G3FC) format. It is compressed with the open-source Zstandard (Zstd) compression algorithm, which provides fast compression and decompression speeds. The G3FC format also supports Forward Error Correction (FEC) to help recover from data corruption, and optional AES-256-GCM encryption to protect the contents of the archive.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
